name: Lucky Shot
description: Lucky Shot is a game in which a player can demonstrate his accuracy and knowledge of physics. The player uses a cannon from which to shoot and collect all the coins. But it's not so simple.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 duo + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
